articles.title: What medical experts are saying about Texas’ ongoing measles outbreaks, treatments - KPRC Click2Houston
articles.description: The College of American Pathologists came together to discuss this measles outbreak to address some concerns, believing the number of measles cases in Texas is an underestimation of how much of the disease is actually out there.
articles.content:
HOUSTON The College of American Pathologists came together recently to discuss this measles outbreak and address some concerns.
